SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.retailproductcatalog.controller

Class RetailProductController

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.retailproductcatalog.controller.RetailProductController
public class RetailProductController extends Object
Controller class that handles product-related operations and returns consistent Response objects to represent outcomes.

This class performs input validation and wraps responses with status codes and messages.

Author:
Muhammed Irfan
